intro: Maieta, commonly known as the "butterfly plant," is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its showy, butterfly-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink and purple. Maieta thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for gardens. Its ornamental value is enhanced by its long blooming period, which can last several months.
